titleStmt.title: His Majesties gracious letter to the Convention of Estates in Scotland, the 13th of June 1678 and the speech of ... the Duke of Lauderdale ... to the Convention of Estates at Edenburgh, the 4th of July, 1678, with the dutiful letter sent to His Majesty from the Convention of Estates in Scotland, the 11th of July, 1678.
titleStmt.author: Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
Lauderdale, John Maitland, Duke of, 1616-1682.
Scotland. Convention of Estates.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.N. for Andrew Forrester,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Imperfect copy: Print on title page partially obliterated. Title verified from caption titles.
